children.placeholder: Ex. “I cannot sleep well and cannot concentrate on daily tasks.”

Ex. He is a 23-year-old male for whom psychiatric evaluation is requested due to depressive mood in the past few weeks. He denies any suicidal thoughts. He admits to morning sickness symptom of anorexia, and difficulty falling + staying asleep. He also admits that he lost his house dog on Monday.
Otherwise: (-) apparent hallucinations or delusions, (-) trauma, (-) fever, (-) headache, (-) substance abuse
Ex. His immediate family consists of his father (age 51), his mother (age 49), one older brother (age 26), and one younger sister (age 19). His father suffers from alcohol dependence.

children.label: Education
children.placeholder: Ex. Attended high school but no graduation

children.label: Work experience
children.placeholder: Ex. Farm helper (2 years), Unstable work history

children.label: Significant life events
children.placeholder: Ex. Attacked by a great earthquake when he was 23

style.label: क) आत्तिने ,कहालिने ,डराउने वा मुटु दुकदुक हुने हुनुभएको थियो ? (Nervious?)
ख) भविष्यमा केही पनि गर्न सक्दिन भनेर हरेस खानुभएको थियो ? (Hopeless?)
ग )छटपटी हुने ,एक ठाउँमा स्थिर भएर बास्न नसक्ने वा कहाँ जाउँ के गरूँ जस्तो हुनुभएको थियो ? (Restless or fidgety?)
घ) तपाईंको मनमा भएको दिक्दारिपन ,उदासिपन वा खिन्नताले गर्दा कुनैपनि कुराले केही गरेपनि खुसी हुननसक्ने हनुभएको थियो ? (So depressed that nothing could cheer you up?)
ङ्) जे काम गर्दापनि एकदमै जाँगर नलागिकन जबर्जस्ती गर्न परेको जस्तो लागेको थियो ? (That everything was an effort?)
च) आफुलाई काम नलाग्ऩे बेकारको मान्छे जस्तो ठान्नुभएको थियो ? (Worthless?)
